title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7.35 - Replacements and additions to checker and clerk list
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7.35 - Replacements and additions to checker and clerk list

State Regulations

Replacements and additions to the checker and clerk list, except for timekeepers, who may be selected without regard to seniority, shall
be selected in the following order from: (a) employees listed on the same regular
checker and clerk employee list; and, thereafter, (b) the employer may select any checker or
clerk on the basis of seniority classification in the
industry. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
7.35

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
